Package ch.zhaw.it.pm3.spacerunner.technicalservices.visual.util

Class VisualUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.zhaw.it.pm3.spacerunner.technicalservices.visual.util.VisualUtil
  • public class VisualUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Util to load visuals Implemented with the singleton-pattern.

    Uses the org.apache.batik libraries for svg processing.

      • loadImage

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage loadImage​(java.net.URL imageURL)
        Loads the image from the URL provided

        imageURL - URL of the image to load. not null
        Returns:

      • generateBackground

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage generateBackground​(java.awt.image.BufferedImage inputImage,
                                                       int scaledWidth,
                                                       int scaledHeight)
        Generates the "infinite" background ("normal image" + "mirror image" + "normal image").
        Parameters:
        inputImage - image for background. not null
        scaledWidth - width used for the background (will be tripled in the output image). has to be higher than 0 (positive)
        scaledHeight - height used for background. has to be higher than 0 (positive)
        Returns:
        background image with size (3*scaledWidth, scaledHeight) contains ("normal image" + "mirror image" + "normal image").

      • resizeImage

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage resizeImage​(java.awt.image.BufferedImage inputImage,
                                                int scaledWidth,
                                                int scaledHeight)
        This will resize the inputImage and return the resized image
        Parameters:
        inputImage - image to resize. not null
        scaledWidth - width for resized image. has to be higher than 0 (positive)
        scaledHeight - height for resized image. has to be higher than 0 (positive)
        Returns:
        resized image

      • loadSVGImage

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage loadSVGImage​(java.net.URL imageURL,
                                                 float height)
        Loads the SVG image from the URL provided
        Parameters:
        imageURL - URL of the image to load. not null
        height - height for the image in px. higher than 0 (positive)
        Returns:
        loaded image

      • flipImage

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage flipImage​(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                                              boolean horizontal)
        Flips the image.
        Parameters:
        image - image to flip. not null
        horizontal - should flip horizontal? if false it is flipped vertically
        Returns:
        image flipped in the correct direction

      • rotateImage

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage rotateImage​(java.awt.image.BufferedImage bufferedImage,
                                                int deg)
        Rotate an image by the specified degree.
        Parameters:
        bufferedImage - image to rotate
        deg - degrees for rotation
        Returns:
        rotated image
